member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataPurge.Tasks.Options.Workers.DeleteInteractionsDistributedWorkerOptions.DeleteEventIds
member.summary: Gets the event ids. All interactions with at least one id should be deleted.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataPurge.Tasks.Options.Workers.DeleteInteractionsDistributedWorkerOptions.SkipEventIds
member.summary: Gets the skip event ids. All interactions with at least one id should not be deleted.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataPurge.Tasks.Options.Workers.DeleteInteractionsDistributedWorkerOptions.DeleteChannelIds
member.summary: Gets the channel ids. All interactions interacted through any channel from the list should be deleted.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataPurge.Tasks.Options.Workers.DeleteInteractionsDistributedWorkerOptions.SkipChannelIds
member.summary: Gets the skip channel ids. All interacted through any channel from the list should not be deleted.
